comments:
Config:  stable 20020214, Sun JDK 1.3.1, Solaris 8

I'm not using the PDE -- I was just going for a wander through the preferences
settings in the new build -- so I'm not heartbroken about this, but in case
someone else is:

Bring up the Preferences window, expand PDE node, select Advanced Tracing node,
and try to expand Workspace Plug-ins node.  Generates error pop-up (which can
be dismissed but not iconified or resized to a useful size, but I digress) and
this entry in the .log:

Log: Sat Feb 16 17:24:25 EST 2002
1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
Log: Sat Feb 16 17:24:25 EST 2002
4 org.eclipse.ui 0 java.lang.NullPointerException
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at

This problem is a regression caused by changes in the Workbench UI and has been 
fixed. The fix is in the nightly builds and will also be available in the next 
integration build.
